name: validflow
description: ValidFlow is a desktop software that automatically helps it's user to arrange their'files, folders and documents.

scripts.test: echo "No tests defined. Please add test scripts." && exit 1
scripts.release: standard-version && node update-tauri-version.js && git add validflow-frontend/src-tauri/Cargo.toml validflow-frontend/src-tauri/tauri.conf.json && git commit -m "chore: sync version to Cargo.toml and tauri.conf.json" && git push --follow-tags
scripts.dev:frontend: cd validflow-frontend && npm run tauri dev
scripts.dev: concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c green,blue "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
